messages.message:
Hi team, i know this question has been asked a few times before but just want to get the latest update (AXA UK is asking):
1. Do we have any timelines on when we plan to support Azure Blob storage mounting to ib filesystem?
2. In the absence of mounting this properly through mount-tservice, do we have any example UDFs where we've pushed docs to Azure blob storage via API (e.g. in post-flow)?
    a. @Blaise @alagar is this technically possible from the Azure side?
